objectives ¢ Describe different types of premium audits,

namely final audits and premium reports

Darren

Insurance ,
- We offer worker’s compensation policies. We

Product Manager

audit payrolls monthly and at the end of the
policy term. How does PolicyCenter handle it?

Julia
Implementation We
Architect
There are two ways to handle this:
premium report and final audit.

!

Premium report Premium report Final audit

Policy term (estimate > actual)

Audits are line of business (LOB) specific

A submission creates a policy with a premium based on estimated information,
such as the insured's revenue

A premium report collects the actual data periodically within the policy term
* Can change policy premium

A final audit may occur at the end of the term to ensure the policy does not reflect
estimated data
